task_description: Facing the building to your East (approx. 103°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the building's height, I need to look up to see the top of the building.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly to ensure accurate height estimation.
I need to look up again to see the top of the building for a better height estimation.
I need to correct my heading to 103° to face the building directly and then look up to see the top.
Now that I am facing the building and looking up, I can estimate the height based on the visible structure.
